Create a custom power strip with different colored outlets to make your workspace more visually appealing.
Use a power strip with built-in surge protectors to protect your devices from power fluctuations.
Use a power strip with multiple USB ports to charge multiple devices at once.
Use a power strip with a built-in timer to automatically turn off devices after a certain amount of time.
Use a power strip with a built-in smart technology that can be controlled through a mobile app, allowing you to turn devices on and off remotely.
